info.author: Dipl.-Ing. Mustafa GÃ¶rmezer
info.description:
msoffice2ps is a Python Module for conversion of Microsoft Office Documents to
Postscript. It uses win32com and Pythoncom from Pywin32 (Marc Hammond) to
printout Office Documents to a specified Postscipt Printer.

You can use it e.g. to build a PDF Converter with Ghostscript in your own
application. To convert a Word document simply make:

import msoffice2ps
msoffice2ps.word('test.doc', 'test.ps', 'My Postscript Printer')

That`s all...
info.keywords: Postscript, Pywin, win32com, pythoncom, microsoft, office, word, excel, powerpoint
info.name: MSOffice2PS-Python-Module
info.summary: A Microsoft Office to Postscript Converter as a Python Module
info.html_description:
msoffice2ps is a Python Module for conversion of Microsoft Office Documents to Postscript. It uses win32com and Pythoncom from Pywin32 (Marc Hammond) to printout Office Documents to a specified Postscipt Printer.

You can use it e.g. to build a PDF Converter with Ghostscript in your own application. To convert a Word document simply make:

import msoffice2ps msoffice2ps.word(‘test.doc’, ‘test.ps’, ‘My Postscript Printer’)

That`s all…
